content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a pizza. Moving in a clockwise direction from the pizza, the elements on the path are a trilobite, a pirate ship, a Griffon Bruxellois, a traffic sign, a maraca, a jaguar, a sea slug, a shower curtain, and a soap dispenser. Starting from the trilobite, you move around the ring by 2 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a pizza. Moving in a clockwise direction from the pizza, the elements on the path are a trilobite, a pirate ship, a Griffon Bruxellois, a traffic sign, a maraca, a jaguar, a sea slug, a shower curtain, and a soap dispenser.
